page.title: 08Robert's Opinion of....
page.content: In my area there are lots of facilities for sport .There are two play areas one at The Good Shepherd and one down Renda Road in Holbury. On Friday I go to football training.In the Summer we train at the Manor.Our team is called Manor F.C. There are several youth clubs at Blackfield. Calshot and Lepe are beaches nearby .At Calshot there are two five_aside football pitches,four badminton courts and a ski slope.Lepe has got a coast_guard station,one cafe and an ice cream shop.There is also a B.M.X. track which has got alot of bumps and that gets a lot of wear . Esso and I.S.R. have Judo clubs for boys and girls. Esso Cinema was changed into the Waterside Cinema because people thought it was just for Esso workers.The Sea Scouts go to Hythe for their meetings.
